snippet: Bobby Parnell, who learned last week that he has a partially torn ulnar collateral ligament, will become the third Mets pitcher to have Tommy John surgery since last summer.
abstract: New York Mets closer Bobby Parnell will undergo Tommy John surgery on his right elbow, ending his season.
lead_paragraph: Bobby Parnell, who learned last week that he has a partially torn ulnar collateral ligament, will become the third Mets pitcher to have Tommy John surgery since last summer.

headline.main: Surgery Will Shelve Mets’ Parnell for Season
headline.print_headline: Surgery Will Shelve Mets’ Parnell for Season
